introduction: South China, 1981.Feiyan, 11, has never seen a film in her life. One day, she discovers illegal screenings organized by a young generation eager to meet the modern world. But a few months later, local authorities spot the trafficking and some jealous classmates report her to the headteacher. She is punished but will never regret it. Cinema was all worth it.After School (2021) is the story of my mother and my love letter to cinema.
